item.title: Call For Paper
item.description: DevFest Toulouse will take place on October 3rd, 2019 at Pierre Baudis congress center. Our fourth edition will gather 1000 attendees! While waiting for the D-day do not hesitate to propose a talk at DevFest Toulouse CFP. It is now open and this year it will be for 2 months only (from March the 25th to Mai the 25th.) Be aware that at mid terms, we will select our “early speakers”, so do not wait till the end!
